params.text: Muna so mu je filin wasa
Ta yaya za mu isa wajen?
Kodai mu hau keke ne.
Kuma muna iya hawa mashin.
Zamu iya hawa nape
Za mu iya hawa mangalar doki.
Za kuma mu iya zuwa a mangalar shanu.
Zamu iya hawa motar tsere.
Zamu iya hawa babbar mota.
Zamu iya tuƙa kwalakwale.
Zamu iya hawa Giwa.
A'a! Kawai mu taka.

“Filin wasa” credits

This work, “Filin wasa” is a derivative of “Playground” by All Children Reading Cambodia. © The Asia Foundation , 2019 and used under CC BY.

“Filin wasa” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.

Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
